retrieval.dist

Interface Message

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageError, MessageNBT, MultiServerMessageAction, MultiServerMessageDelete, MultiServerMessageIndex, MultiServerMessageIndexResults, MultiServerMessageInfos, MultiServerMessageNBT, MultiServerMessageResults, MultiServerMessageSimilarities, MultiServerMessageStorages

    public interface Message
    Force to implement method for XML message In practice, each class MessageX which implements Message should implement a constructor: MessageX(Document xml) so that client and server can read/write MessageX from/to XML.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jdom.Document toXML()
      Generate a XML document from the error message

                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate a XML document from the error message
        Returns:
        XML document
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error during XML generation
